entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:02 AM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
